name: anaphrodisiac
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
something that reduces or prevents sexual desire, or is believed to do this: According to traditional medicine, the berry of this tree is an anaphrodisiac for men. Many online articles can be found listing alleged anaphrodisiacs, or foods that can lower your libido. Synonym
anti-aphrodisiac
More examplesFewer examplesStudies failed to support the theory that soy-based foods are an anaphrodisiac.The name of the place where the show was set, Birmingham, was never mentioned for fear or putting off viewers. Is England's second city really such an anaphrodisiac? He stated that he found trousers on women to be an anaphrodisiac.
